name: Rocket Rush (itch) (Kitsun)
description:
This game was made for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2021.

In this game, you are a rocket, exclusively made to collect stars (meaning that anything else will harm you!). Watch out! the government has found you and is fighting back by placing mines, launching bullets and firing missiles. 

Dodge, Redirect, and Destroy your enemies to reach for the stars!

Tip: Think strategically, you are not limited to use shield pickups for only protection. 🤔
